at.rags.morpheus

Class Mapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.rags.morpheus.Mapper

  • public class Mapper
extends java.lang.Object
    Mapper will map all different top-level members and will also map the relations. Includes will also mapped to matching relationship members.

      • mapRelations

        public Resource mapRelations(Resource object,
                             org.json.JSONObject jsonObject,
                             java.util.List<Resource> included)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Loops through relation JSON array and maps annotated objects.
        Parameters:
        object - Real object to map.
        jsonObject - JSONObject.
        included - List of included resources.
        Returns:
        Real object with relations.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when deserializer is not able to create instance.

      • matchIncludedToRelation

        public Resource matchIncludedToRelation(Resource object,
                                        java.util.List<Resource> included)
        Will check if the relation is included. If true included object will be returned.
        Parameters:
        object - Relation resources.
        included - List of included resources.
        Returns:
        Relation of included resource.

      • matchIncludedToRelation

        public java.util.List<Resource> matchIncludedToRelation(java.util.List<Resource> relationResources,
                                                        java.util.List<Resource> included)
        Loops through relations and calls matchIncludedToRelation(Resource, List).
        Parameters:
        relationResources - List of relation resources.
        included - List of included resources.
        Returns:
        List of relations and/or included resources.

      • mapErrors

        public java.util.List<Error> mapErrors(org.json.JSONArray errorArray)

      • createData

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>> createData(java.util.List<Resource> resources,
                                                                                            boolean includeAttributes)
        Create data representation from resources. This will return the representation of the resources as list of maps. Every item contains a map with the resource's id, type and relationships (if any). Attributes are only included when 'includeAttributes' is true.
        Parameters:
        resources - List of resources.
        includeAttributes - Add attributes map to representation.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Hashmaps.

      • createData

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> createData(Resource resource,
                                                                       boolean includeAttributes)
        Create data represenation from resource. This will return the repersentation of the resource. The map contains the id, type and relationships (if any). Attributes are only included when 'includeAttributes' is true.
        Parameters:
        resource - Resource to create data.
        includeAttributes - Add attributes map to representation.
        Returns:
        Hashmaps.

      • createRelationships

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> createRelationships(Resource resource)
        Creates the relationships represenation from an resource. Will go through the relationships of a resource and return them as a map. The keys of the returned map will be the resource type of the relationship and the value a map of the data or a list of maps containing data of multiple relations.
        Parameters:
        resource - Resource to create relationships from.
        Returns:
        HashMap of related resource names with their data.

      • createLinks

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> createLinks(Resource resource)
        Returns a resources links as a map.
        Parameters:
        resource - Resource to get links from.
        Returns:
        Map of the links.

        Create the included as list of maps.
        Parameters:
        resource - Resource with relations.
